name: Abstraction LED Pendant light (red) 35% OFF!!
description:
The Abstraction LED pendant light is made up of 8 laser-cut acrylic leaves that, when put together form a dramatic contemporary sculptural light. All of the leaves are interchangeable with the other colors and shapes in the series, allowing a variety of creative designs.

Each light comes with a direct wire cord-set, ceiling plate and mounting hardware, dimmable LED bulb (40 watt incandescent equivalent), and a 9 foot length of the highest quality textile cord from Sweden, available in red, white, or black.  

These lights accept normal Edison base light bulbs as well (40 watt max).  All of the acrylic Abstraction pendants are made to order and signed/dated by the designer.  

Pendant dimensions:

Diameter: 22" Height: 17

Made in the USA

name: Migration Signature Series
description:
Migration Signature Series

SIGNATURE SERIES
Each piece in the Perhacs Signature Series has been handmade by the designer, and is personally signed.

Use these modern oil candles as a single statement, or combine them for more sophisticated displays.

This contemporary interpretation of an oil lamp consists of a precision-machined stainless steel torch encasing a durable fiberglass wick. The torch is set within a 25mm x 150mm glass tube, resting at an angle within the base. The base is PaperStone, an FSC-certified composite made from 100% post-consumer recycled paper. The paper is saturated with a resin based on on cashew nut shells, and the fibers are cross-linked under pressure, transforming it to a dense, durable and elegant material. 

Includes: 1 PaperStone base, 1 brushed stainless steel torch with wick, and 1 glass tube.

Designed and handmade by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2009-2012 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

name: Micropolis Series: First Industry Pendant
description:
Made in limited editions by the designer himself, each individual piece in the Micropolis series is manually machined, hand finished, and then signed, dated and numbered by Brandon Perhacs. The First Industry Pendant is constructed from stainless steel, silicone rubber, rare earth magnets and Paperstone, a composite of recycled paper and non petroleum water based resin.

The Micropolis aesthetic merges the forms of contemporary architecture and everyday industrial objects, creating a playful dialogue between the two. The magnetic clasp is seamlessly integrated into the pendant, becoming a core part of the design.

Edition of 9.

Designed by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2010-2011 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

name: Basic Stix + Stones Signature Series
description:
Stix + Stones SIGNATURE SERIES

Each piece in the Perhacs Signature Series has been hand-made by the designer, and is personally signed and dated.

Stix+Stones is a line of jewelry that enables the wearer to create a wide variety of unique sculptural looks, using two fundamental elements. The innovative design potential of Stix+Stones is hidden inside the hand-brushed stainless steel stix, with invisible magnetic stops positioned  precisely at 8" intervals. This allows the user to play freely with the elements, while ensuring that the parts line up in a symmetrical manner, making possible a vast array of striking and elegant designs.
The high level of engineering and complexity in this necklace is unseen to the naked eye.  In total there are 25 individual components that make up the this fine piece of jewelry.
In each basic set there are 2 custom, machined and hand brushed stainless steel parts.  Hidden in the stainless steel "stix" are 14 individual magnets placed at precise intervals which enables the intricate and elegant designs.  The 4 brushed sphere magnets add a totally new dimension to the endless  number of possible designs.  The black cord is made of the highest quality silicone rubber.  

The Basic Necklace includes four magnetic spheres of silver and black nickel. A "Full" version for $225.00 is also available in the "Jewelry" section.

The length of the cord is 16" long. Custom lengths are available upon request for $20 USD extra.

Designed and handmade by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2007-2012 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

WATCH THE VIDEO 
TO SEE A DEMONSTRATION 
OF HOW TO CREATE YOUR 
OWN DESIGNS WITH 
STIX + STONES

CLICK ON PLAY TO WATCH

name: Full Stix + Stones Signature Series
description:
Stix + Stones SIGNATURE SERIES

Each piece in the Perhacs Signature Series has been hand-made by the designer, and is personally signed and dated.

Stix+Stones is a line of jewelry that enables the wearer to create a wide variety of unique sculptural looks, using two fundamental elements. The innovative design potential of Stix+Stones is hidden inside the hand-brushed stainless steel stix, with invisible magnetic stops positioned  precisely at 8" intervals. This allows the user to play freely with the elements, while ensuring that the parts line up in a symmetrical manner, making possible a vast array of striking and elegant designs.
The high level of engineering and complexity in this necklace is unseen to the naked eye.  In total there are 69 individual components that make up the this fine piece of jewelry.
In each full set there are 12 custom, machined and hand brushed stainless steel parts.  Hidden in the stainless steel "stix" are 50 individual magnets placed at precise intervals which enables the intricate and elegant designs.  The 6 brushed sphere magnets add a totally new dimension to the endless  number of possible designs.  The black cord is made of the highest quality silicone rubber.  

The Full Necklace cord comes with six brushed stainless steel stix of assorted lengths, and six magnetic spheres of silver and black nickel. 

A "Basic" version for $120.00 is also available in the "Jewelry" section.

The length of the cord is 16" long. Custom lengths are available upon request for $20 USD extra.

Designed by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2007-2011 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

name: Stix + Stones Custom Length Option
description:
Add this option to your shopping cart along with a Stix + Stones necklace to get a custom cord length for your necklace.  Just add a note during check-out specifying what length you want your cord to be. Or email your custom cord length to info@perhacs-studio.com.

Note: Custom lengths are not eligible for exchange or return.

Have fun ;)

name: Adaptation Vase (aluminum/black)
description:
Adaptation is a finely crafted vase that invites unique approach to flower arranging. It is designed with 4 magnets set in an aluminum base, plus 4 glass tubes and 4 stainless steel spheres. Follow instructions by carefully inserting the 404 stainless steel spheres into the tubes and place them on the magnets in the base. The tube vases may be tilted, swayed, and turned into desired configurations. Add water and flowers to create a unique centerpiece!

The base is machined from a solid piece of aluminum, which has grained and anodized for a striking and durable finish.

Design by Brandon Perhacs 2009
Made in USA

name: Adaptation-3tube/wood
description:
Adaptation is a finely crafted vase that invites a unique approach to flower arranging. It is designed with 3 magnets set in a wood base, plus 3 glass tubes and 3 stainless steel spheres. The base is made from wood sustainably harvested locally from Bainbridge Island where Perhacs Studio is based.

Follow instructions by carefully inserting the stainless steel spheres into the tubes and place them on the magnets in the base. The tube vases may be tilted, swayed, and turned into desired configurations.

Wood base dimensions: Length 7" Width 2 1/2" Thickness 3/4"

Designed by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2010-2012 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

name: eweBOL
description:
The eweBOL is small scale soft architecture.  This sculptural bowl is made from the worlds finest 100% merino wool felt. It's reversible and easily snaps together with other bowls to create many modular designs.

Diameter:9" Height:5"

Designed by Brandon Perhacs

MADE IN THE USA

copyright © 2010-2011 Brandon Perhacs. Perhacs Studio.

name: Stix + Stones replacement ball magnets
description: Replacement magnets for Stix + Stones necklaces.  Includes 2 black, and 2 silver nickel plated sphere magnets. 4 magnets total.
